about:
In the ever-evolving world of technology, I find endless inspiration in learning, innovating, and pushing creative boundaries.
With over 10 years of experience as a Frontend Developer, I specialize in building dynamic, user-centric web and mobile applications using technologies like ReactJS, React Native, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
My journey has been fueled by a passion for crafting seamless digital experiences that turn complex ideas into simple, beautiful, and functional products.
From working on enterprise-grade applications to leading projects involving AI-powered travel apps and blockchain innovations, I am deeply committed to delivering solutions that blend innovation with real-world impact.
